mapper.sql: id, aid, pid, bid, count, price, total, opstatus, status
mapper.select: select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

update productbox_ap_item
aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

opstatus = #{opstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kg = #{kg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
